nodes.body: During the Degé (sde dge) period this locale (polity?) had an interesting relationship with Degé and Lingtsang (gling tshang), as well as with the regional Geluk (dge lugs) monasteries. There is at least one new history (lo rgyus) of Denma (’dan ma, also known as ldan khog).
nodes.title: An Overview of Denma
